description: Add, modify or delete sudo rule within IPA server using IPA API.

cmd.description: List of commands assigned to the rule.

host.description: List of hosts assigned to the rule.

hostgroup.description: List of host groups assigned to the rule.

usercategory.description: User category the rule applies to.

hostcategory.description: Host category the rule applies to.

user.description: List of users assigned to the rule.

usergroup.description: List of user groups assigned to the rule.

cmdcategory.description: Command category the rule applies to.

validate_certs.description: This only applies if C(ipa_prot) is I(https).
